original_title: Sri Lanka bonds open steady, rupee 313.75/314.50 to dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka bonds were steady at open, dealers said while the spot US dollar opened at 313.75/314.50 rupees.
A bond maturing on 15.09.2027 was quoted at 14.50/75 unchanged from yesterday’s close.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2026 and a bond maturing on 01.07.2025 have not been quoted. (Colombo/ July10/2023)
